name: Xentripetal Force
description:
Xentripetal Force is an action game that let's you and your friends to experience a competitive survival match that takes place in outer space.

Modes:
  • Survival Mode
  • Insane Survival Mode
  • Scoring Mode
  • Insane Scoring Mode
  • Cooperative Survival Mode
  • Insane Cooperative Survival Mode
  • And more!

Playable Characters:
4 playable characters so far and more is coming soon!

Environment:
Randomized to let you feel every game is different and interesting.MORE is coming!
